product_name: Natural High Three Cheese Lasagna - 2 Servings
long_description: Monterey jack, parmesan and cottage cheese combine with chunky tomato sauce to give this meatless home-style lasagna lots of flavor. Easy-to-prepare--just add boiling water, let stand and serve. All-natural instant entree--no artificial colors or flavors, additives or preservatives. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
